LoginOrRegister: Register or login, using one of the buttons below
PasswordChangeSuccess: The password has been changed successfully. To log in click the button below.
ResetPasswordLink: The link to reset the password will be sent to the email address entered below.
EmailIncorrect: The email address you entered is incorrect.
ResetPasswordLinkSent: The password reset link has been sent to the entered email address.
Name: Name
UEMembersOnly: Only UE citizens can register to our app, so there are only UE countries on the list.
FieldLength: This field has to be from 3 to 15 charecters long.
ActivationLinkSent: Link to actiavte the account has been sent to the entered email address. Activate the account and log in.
AccountActivated: Your account has been activated. Click the button below to log in.
